description:
With Calorie Trails, losing weight is fun!  The software was developed by Jordan Train, M.D., a lifelong exercise enthusiast and 
physician with years of experience in designing exercise programs and applications to help patient's manage their weight. 

Walk or run with your phone and watch the calorie meter keep track of calories burned and weight lost.  At the same time, you can watch the app paint your trail as you move about.

The app makes use of the latest exercise physiology studies to produce the most accurate 'Calories Burned' reports available.  

Other features include speed tracking, distance tracking, ascension tracking, and Calorie meters for ascension and distance traveled. 
There are 20 built-in speed modes for calculating Calorie consumption and each mode is set automatically, based on your travel speed and weight.  
The app has multiple tap areas that allow you to view and customize speed and travel data.  A beautiful statistics page shows your
 total miles, number of workouts and metabolic stats for each exercise session. Tap  on speed and distance and convert the units to various forms of US and metric measurements.  The application is extremely well documented with ample help and prompts making this one of the easiest-to-use exercise incentive tools around.  For a limited time, this is a Palm device exclusive.    


Special Features: 
The software also serves as an excellent navigation tool and includes a GPS-controlled compass, moment-by-moment coordinate tracking
 and a trail tracing that records and optionally stores your path.  The app does not require phone service.   All that is needed is a clear view of the sky!
versionNote: Greatly improved performance on the statistics page.
